dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa
dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa
dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam
par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o/ /stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam
par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams
cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag
pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang 'dus byas rnam
par dag pas/ 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa'o/ /'dus ma byas rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ 'dus byas
rnam par dag pa dang / 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha
mi dad de gcad du med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang 'das pa rnam par dag pas/ ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas/
'das pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pas/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas/ da ltar
byung ba rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ 'das pa rnam par dag pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis

dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ sems can dmyal ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ zab lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab po/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ /gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du zab pa lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par
shes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /
gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /
tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid shin
tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam
par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
phyir zab pa yin no/ /stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa
yin no/ /byang chub shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no/ /shA ri'i
bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par
dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du snang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
bu/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag
pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /mig shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid shin tu
rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang
ba yin no/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang /
brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
yan lag dang / lam shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ snang ba yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni/
snang ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
bu| shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pas/ rnam par dag pa
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs 'pho ba med pas/ nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni/ rnam par dag pa yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'pho ba med pas/ nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni/ rnam par dag pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ kun
nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das/ gang la kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pas/ rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas
nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/ /
shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA
ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par
dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs la thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/ /rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ mngon
par ma grub pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang mngon par
grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/ /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ 'dod pa'i
khams su mi skye ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam
par dag pa 'dod pa'i khams su mi skye ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med
pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ gzugs kyi khams su mi skye ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pa gzugs kyi khams su mi skye ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag
pa ni/ gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams su mi skye lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pa gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams su mi skye ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyi
rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ 'tshal ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pa 'tshal ba ma mchis
pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos bem po nyid kyi phyir rnam par dag pa ni/ shes pa med pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam
par dag pa ni/ gzugs ma 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pas/ gzugs ma 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par
dag pas gzugs mi shes so/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du rnam par dag pa ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
pa ma 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/
rnam par dag pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ rang gi
mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par dag pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes so/ /shA ri'i bus
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa ni/ chos thams cad ma 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
ro| |shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pa'i chos thams cad ma 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ chos thams
cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pas chos thams cad mi shes so/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid la sman par yang mi bgyid/ gnod par yang mi bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i
bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sman par yang mi bgyid/ gnod par yang mi bgyid pa lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par yang mi byed/ gnod par
yang mi byed do/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ni/ chos gang yang longs su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa chos gang yang
yongs su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du gzugs rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du/ bdag rnam par dag pas/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ bdag med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa ni/ shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i
slad du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ bdag med pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
par shes pa med pa ni/ shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa lags
so| |bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par
dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i
slad du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par
rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag ba'i phyir ro/ /rab
'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ bdag med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad med pa ni/ shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
rnam par dag pa'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor/ rang gi mtshan nyid
stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa dang / bdag rnam par
dag pas/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du byang chub rnam par
dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag rnam par
dag pas/ byang chub rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par
dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes pa ma rnyed/ ma stor ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnyis su ma mchis shing rnam par
dag pa ni/ thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
ro| |rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du gnyis su ma mchis shing / rnam par dag pa thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mu ma mchis pa'i
slad du gzugs mu ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
ci'i slad du bdag mu ma mchis pas/ gzugs mu ma mchis shing rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mu ma mchis pa'i slad du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das/ ci'i slad du bdag mu ma mchis pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis shing / rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa don/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir
ro| |rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshu rol gyi 'gram mam/ pha rol
gyi 'gram mam/ gnyi ga ma mchis pa la'ang mi dmigs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshu rol gyi 'gram mam/ pha rol gyi
'gram mam/ gnyi ga ma mchis pa la'ang mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ gal te theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'di ltar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'du
shes su bgyid na/ de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu bgyid pa lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring du bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ rab 'byor/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /ming du'ang chags/ mtshan mar yang chags te/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ mtshan
ma med pa/ ming med pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ ming du'ang chags pa lags/ mtshan mar yang chags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming du'ang 'dzin par byed/ mtshan mar yang
'dzin par byed cing / ming dang / mtshan mar bzung nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su byed de/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su
byed pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing rgyang ring du byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang / chags pa dang / ma chags pa 'di dag legs par bshad cing shin tu mthar gtugs pa ni/ ngo
mtshar lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa ni/ gang yin/ ma chags pa ni/ gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg
pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa gzugs stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams la'ang de bzhin no/ /sbyin
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /de bzhin du yang dag par
spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg
pa ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma
'ongs pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ chags pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sems dang po bskyed phyin chad dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ chags pa yin no//
tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ chags pa yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par
spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la spyod na/ chags pa yin no/ /stobs bcu dang /
mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na/ chags pa yin no/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma chags pa gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du/ gzugs kyis gzugs kun tu mi shes so/ /tshor ba
dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa kun tu mi shes so/ /'das pa'i chos rnams kyis 'das pa'i chos rnams kun tu mi shes so/ /ma 'ongs
pa'i chos rnams kyis ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kun tu mi shes so/ /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kun tu mi shes so/ /snyam du mi sems so/ /tshe dang ldan
pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di snyam du/ bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin
par bya'o/ /'di la sbyin par bya'o/ /'di sbyin par bya'o/ /zhe'am/ de bzhin du bdag gis tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab bsgom
bar bya'o// shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o/ /shes rab 'di ltar bsgom par bya'o/ /zhe'am/ bdag gis bsod nams spel bar byed pa'o/ /bsod nams 'di spel bar bya'o/ /bsod nams
'di ltar spel bar bya'o/ /zhe'am/ bdag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o/ /bdag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'o/ /bdag ni/ sems can rnams
yongs su smin par byed pa'o/ /bdag ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'o/ /snyam du mi sems te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la ni/ de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa dag med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma chags pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang
ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags par 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
kau shi ka /'di la byang chub sems dpas sems su kun tu shes pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab tu kun tu
shes pa dang / nang stong pa nyid du kun tu shes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du kun tu shes pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag
par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su kun tu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su kun tu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas las bskyed pa'i dge
ba'i rtsa ba rnams su kun tu shes pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te brtul cing gzhal nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa de ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chags pa ste/ des ni/ chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di ltar/
gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni/ yongs su bsngo bar mi nus la/ kau shi ka/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang yongs su bsngo bar
mi nus shing / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin yang yongs su bsngo bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub kyi don du gzhan dag la ston par 'dod pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
du rtogs pa'i yid kyis yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya zhing /
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ci nas kyang bdag ni/ sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'o/ /bdag ni/ tshul khrims srung ba'o/ /bdag ni/ bzod pa sgom pa'o/ /bdag ni/ brtson
'grus rtsom pa'o/ /bdag ni/ bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /bdag ni/ shes rab sgom pa'o/ /bdag ni/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'o/ /bdag ni/ dngos po med pa'i
ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'o/ /bdag ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gsum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa'o/ /bdag ni/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'o/ /
snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar gzhan dag la yang dag par ston pa
dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa de ni/ bdag kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la/ de dag
la'ang sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pas yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin no/ /kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de la
ltar gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ste/ kau
shi ka /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de ltar chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gang khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i mtha' de dag bstan pa legs so/ /legs so//
rab 'byor/ chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba gzhan dag kyang khyod la bstan par bya'i/ de dag legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /
tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
rab 'byor/ 'di la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan mar
yid la byed na/ rab 'byor/ ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no/ /gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung
ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das
nas ji srid du dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing / yid la byas nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor/ ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa thams cad dang bral ba
rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag dang / de las gzhan pa sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang mtshan mar yid la byas nas bla na med yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor/ ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs
pa ni/ mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin la/ de dag las gzhan pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ zab pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos
thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lags so/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ ma byas shing mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ni/ sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par
mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ni/ mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni/ gnyis ma yin te/ gcig tu zad do/ /rab 'byor/ chos kyi rang bzhin gcig pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin ma yin no/ /gang rang
bzhin ma yin pa de ni/ ma byas pa'o/ /gang ma byas pa de ni/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang lta ba rang bzhin gcig pa
dang / rang bzhin ma yin pa dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas par shes na/ chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rtogs par dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
sus kyang ma mthong / ma thos shing / bye brag ma phyed de/ rnam par ma shes la/ mngon par rdzogs par khong du ma chud pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa ni/ sus kyang mi shes
pa ste| gzugs kyis mi shes so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas mi shes so/ /khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
pa rnams kyis mi shes so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis mi shes so/ /stobs rnams
dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/
chos thams cad rnam par dag par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bgyid pa po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa ni/ chos thams cad dmigs su med par byed pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod pa'i tshe gal te gzugs la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa
rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces
bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /
sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba
dang / mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba
dang / sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhen/ gang rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug
bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med la/ gang rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/
bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
shes pa'ang med cing / de bzhin du gang rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur
ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gal te gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin
du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ gzugs ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin la/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang
yin pa de/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin zhing / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
'di ltar chags pa dang / chags pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la legs par gsungs
pa ni| ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
ba'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa dag legs par bshad do/ /rab 'byor/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod pa yin no/ /mig chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
yid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa
med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa med pa zhes bya
bar 'du shes pa med do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu dgu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar chos bstan pa zab mo 'di bshad kyang 'phel ba ma mchis la/ ma bshad kyang 'grib pa ma mchis pa de ni/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /de
skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
ni| bshad kyang 'phel ba med la/ ma bshad kyang 'grib pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i bsngags pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par gyur kyang nam mkha' la ni/ bsngags ba brjod kyang 'phel ba med la/ bsngags pa ma
yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa med de/ nam mkha' ni/ bsngags kyang 'phel ba med la/ ma bsngags kyang 'grib pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la ni/ bsngags pa brjod kyang

'phel ba med la/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa med de/ bsngags pa brjod kyang rjes su chags pa med/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang khong khro ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du chos rnams
kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de'ang bshad kyang de bzhin la/ ma bshad kyang de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa na/ zhum par yang mi 'gyur la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub las kyang slar mi ldog pa de dag ni/ dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de ni/ nam mkha' sgom

pa lags te/ nam mkha' la ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni/ gzugs kyang ma mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma mchis/ nam

mkha' la ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyang ma mchis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu

'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams kyang ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams

dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis/ de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra

bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang ma mchis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis sems
can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni/ nam mkha'i slad du brtson par 'tshal ba dang / 'bad par 'tshal ba dang / rtsol bar 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag sems can rnams kyi
slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni/ nam mkha' yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis
nam mkha' lta bu'i chos thams cad kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni/ go cha chen po 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag gis sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha chen po 'tshal ba de dag
ni| nam mkha' bar snang la gdeg par 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis de lta bu'i
go cha 'tshal bde dag la bdag phyag 'tshal lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis 'di lta ste/
dper bgyi na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/ til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gtams par gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bshad par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag yongs su smin par mdzad kyang bcom ldan
'das/ sems can gyi khams la ni/ 'grib pa'am/ 'phel bar mi mngon pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan
'das/ de bzhin du phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal
lam| mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/ til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gtams par gyur cing bzhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bshad par gyur nas
de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag yongs su smin par mdzad kyang / bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gyi khams la ni/ 'grib pa'am/ 'phel bar mi
mngon lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ bdag gis 'di skad du/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ nam mkha' yongs su grol bar

'tshal ba lags so/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di lta ste/ chos gang yang skye ba'ang med/ 'gag pa'ang med la/ tshul khrims kyi phung po'ang yod/ shes rab kyi phung po
dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'ang yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang yod/ lan

gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang yod /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/
dkon mchog gsum po sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yang yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /snyam

mo| |de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor

du byed pa de/ gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya bar sems pa de ni/
nam mkha' la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba ji lta bu zhig bgyi lags/ rab 'byor

gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang la bsrung pa dang / bskyab pa dang / sba

bar bya ba'i chos de ni/ kho bos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas na/ 'di

nyid de la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par 'gyur ro/ /ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral na/ de la mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang zhig bsrung pa dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya bar sems pa de ni/ nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar sems

pa yin no/ /kau shi ka/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dag bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus snyam mam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa

rab 'byor/ de ni/ mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bdag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang /

sba bar bya bar sems pa de'ang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang / ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa
dag bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus snyam mam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de bzhin du gang

zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung pa dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya bar sems pa de'ang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang / ngal ba'i skal ba

can du 'gyur bar zad do/ /kau shi ka/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar

nus snyam mam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa bdag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya bar sems pa de'ang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang / ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad do/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ji tsam gyis na/ chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag ca lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu
dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur yongs su shes par 'gyur zhing / de ltar yongs su shes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam

bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed cing / sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes bya bar
rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ga lte gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyi mtshan mar yang rlom
sems su mi byed na/ rmi lam du rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed cing /
sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin

du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam
par shes pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi
byed| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed na/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi
byed| rmi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed cing / sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul
pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris
dang | tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dag thogs te bcom ldan
'das ga la ba de logs su mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
do| |de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis shar phyogs na sangs rgyas stong
rnam pa 'di dag nyid dang / ming 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthus dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang / shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dag bsam bar gyur to/ /de bzhin
du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams kun na'ang sangs rgyas stong stong rnam pa 'di dag nyid dang / ming 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston cing / sangs
rgyas kyi mthus dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dang / lha'i
dbang po brgya byin sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba dag bsam par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas nas kyang sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rnam pa gang dag dang /
rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag
ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs
sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bcings zhes bya ba dang / grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du
shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / rnam par
shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya
ba dang / grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
bar du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba dang / grol zhes bya bar chos ston
par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs
shin tu rnam par dag go /zhes shin tu rnam par dag ba'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go /zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go /zhes
shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yongs su dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ gzugs yongs su dag
pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad
du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ gzugs yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa yin
no| |rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji
ltar na/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' ni/ skye
ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' gos pa
med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ nam mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ nam mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| ji ltar na/ nam mkha' smra ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta
ste| dper na/ brag ca gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du rab 'byor nam mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
ji ltar na/ nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha'
la ni/ rab tu brjod pa gang yang med de/ de ltar na/ nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ nam mkha' dmigs
su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' la ni/ ci'ang dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na
nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa
dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang
'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang /
kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
par du shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun
nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ chos
thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su ma mchis pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par
byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub bar bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la ni/ mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i
nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /lus ngal bar mi
'gyur lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ gshis ngan du 'gum par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de'i slad bzhin du chos nyan par 'tshal ba'i lha stong phrag mang po dag kyang
'brang bar 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang na dam pa'i
chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa der lha'i tshogs mang po dag kyang
'du bar 'gyur lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa de ni/ bsod nams mang du bskyed bar 'gyur te/ bsod nams dpag tu ma
mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa dag bskyed par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smra bar
byed pa de ni/ bsod nams dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa dag bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta
ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rin po che yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la brten na/ sems can dmyal ba las thar
bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar par 'gyur ro/ /mi dbul po las thar par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs shing sA la
chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar
'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang
chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub skyed par byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de la brten nas rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / khyim bdag gi rigs
shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
byed kyi lha rnams yod pa dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams yod pa dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang /
tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang / shin tu mthong dang / gya nom snang dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min
gyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar
'gro ba'i lha rnams yod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra
bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam gtan bzhi yod pa dang / tshad med pa
bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
dang / lam rnams yod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid yod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa dang / stobs bcu yod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa'i phyir te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di las de dag la sogs pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rin po che zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la ni/ skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su bzung ba'am/ dor ba'i chos gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
ltar| gang dag skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su bzung ba'am/ 'dor bar bya ba'i chos de dag med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'am/ nyon
mongs pa dang bcas pa'am/ nyon mongs pa med pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med do/ /rab
'byor| rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nor bu rin po che yin te/ rab 'byor/ pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de ni/ chos gang gis kyang ma gos pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
ltar| gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de/ dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ des na/ pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni/ gos pa med pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed/ de ltar rnam par rtog par yang mi byed/ de ltar dmigs par yang mi byed/ de ltar
spros par yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
mthong ba yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi
zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song nas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rab 'byor/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang yang thob par byed pa ma yin/ ston par byed pa ma yin/ 'dzin par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ skyed par byed pa ma
yin| 'gog par byed pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin/ rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin/ 'grib par byed pa ma yin/ 'phel bar byed pa ma yin/ 'das
pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed
pa'ang ma yin/ gnas par byed pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ gnas par byed pa'ang ma
yin| sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nying stong
pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ de bzhin du
yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang | dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma
yin| stobs bcu sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
brgyad sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ lan gcig phyir 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed
pha'ang ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/
so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar
byed pa'ang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dus
byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin no/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa'ang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa'ang ma yin na/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'di ni/ gnas pa nyid de/ de de bzhin
gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par thugs su chud de/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ba dang /
rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas lha'i bu 'bum phrag rab tu mang po dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas ca co dang / ga zha
'don cing / lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+dA ra ba dag gis gtor nas 'di skad du/ a la la dzam+bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis
bskor ba 'di mthong ngo / /zhes tshig tu'ang brjod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa na/ de las lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos
gang yang 'jug par bya ba'am/ ldog par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin pas/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa'ang ma yin/ gcig pa'ang ma yin no/ /
rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang yang 'jug par bgyi'am/ ldog par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags
pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //

de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid
kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ dran
pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ni/ lam
gyis stong ngo / /stobs bcu ni/ stobs bcus stong ngo / /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ che ba lags te/ chos thams cad kyang chos thams
cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'ang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis shing / chos kyi 'khor lo'ang bskor la chos gang yang 'jug par bgyid pa'am/ ldog par
bgyid pa'ang ma mchis te/ chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba'ang ma mchis la/ chos gang yang yongs su ma mthong ba'ang ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar /gang 'jug
pa'am/ ldog pa'i chos de dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ 'di ltar/ chos thams cad gtan mngon par ma grub pa lags pas/ stong pa nyid ni/ 'jug par bgyid pa'am/
ldog par bgyid pa ma lags la/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'ang 'jug par bgyid pa'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags so/ /de ltar na/ gang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / gdags pa dang / 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyid
pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa lags so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de'ang sus kyang ma bstan/
sus kyang ma bzung lags so/ /gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni/ sus kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis lags so/ /gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung / sus
kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis pa de la ni/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa su'ang ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la su'ang sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba'ang ma
mchis lags so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnas med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das
la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ /ma mchis pa lags so/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di ni/ mnyam pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad dmigs su med par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dben pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rdzi ba ma mchis pa lags
so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ gzhi ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming med pa dang / lus med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nam mkha' lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dmigs su med
pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ ming ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa
lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta
ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi 'phrog pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
thams cad shin tu byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ skye ba ma
mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byed pa po ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su
med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ shes pa po ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
ni| 'pho ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig
