'dre ba chis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa de ni/ gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa yin te/ de ni/ gzugs kyi skye ba med pa yin no/ /
gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi 'gag pa med pa yin te/ de ni/ gzugs kyi 'dre ba med pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba med pa yin te/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang sbyar
bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams chos
thams cad 'dre ba med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams ji ltar 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la 'di skad du
chos ston te/ gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par
shes pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /zhes chos ston te/ rab 'byor/
gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad gzugs ji lta ba bzhin lags na/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid du mi 'gyur lags sam/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam
par rtog pa ci'ang ma mchis la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci'ang ma mchis te/ de bzhin du/ 'di ni/ gzugs so/ /'di ni/
tshor ba'o/ /'di ni/ 'du shes so/ /'di dag ni/ 'du byed rnams so/ /'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'o/ /zhes bgyi ba dang / 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /zhes bgyi ba'i bar du rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci'ang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi pha
rol ni rnam par rtog pa ci'ang med la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci'ang med de/ rab 'byor/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
chos de lta bu dag la nges par sems shing zhum par yang mi 'gyur la/ de ltar chos de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /snyam ste/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos de dang / ni/ 'di ltar zhi ba'o/ /'di ltar gya nom pa'o/ /zhas sten par byed pa ni/ dka' ba byed pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dong pa rnams 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen yin no/ /rab 'byor/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta

ste| dper na/ chu klung chen po rnams sam rgya mtsho chen po dag na/ sa phyogs gang dag chus yongs su chod pa de dag ni/ gling zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du gzugs ni/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi

ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyi bar ni/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa de dag gis chos thams cad yongs su chad do/ /rab
'byor/ chos thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / dmigs su med pa dang / lam chad pa dang / sred pa zad pa dang /
lhag ma med pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/ de ni/ zhi ba'o/ /de ni/ gya nom pa'o/ /de ni/ ji lta ba'i bdag nyid yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar

na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs
su chad par ston pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi gling yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
ji ltar 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya

bar 'dod pa rnams sems can gyi ris la snying rje chen po bskyed nas gzugs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad

do| |tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston te/ de bzhin du pha

rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do/ /rang byang
chub skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa

dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do/ /de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs ni/ nam mkha'i tshul can no/ /zhes chos ston cing 'chad
do| |tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ nam mkha'i tshul can no/ /zhes sems can rnams la chos ston cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nam

mkha'i tshul can no/ /zhes chos ston to/ /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa ste/ de la 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med do/ /zhes sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes

dang / 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa ste/ de la 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med do/ /zhes sems can rnams la chos

ston to/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa ste/ de la 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med do/ /zhes sems can rnams la chos ston te/ rab 'byor/ de
ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe

na| rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ stong pa nyid kyi tshul can te/ de dag tshul de las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
chos thams cad ni/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma med pa la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos
thams cad ni/ smon pa med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smon pa med pa la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/
mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du

sbyar te| rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams
cad ni/ rmi lam lta bu'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rmi lam la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du chos thams cad

ni| sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul can dang / mig yor lta bu'i tshul can dang / sprul pa lta bu'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sprul pa la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs
pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa la
'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ mtha' yas mu med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' yas mu med

pa la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ dbri ba med pa dang / bsnan pa med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbri ba
med pa dang / bsnan pa med pa la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa'i tshul can no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ blang ba
med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i tshul can no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ phrad pa med pa dang / bral ba med pa dang / 'dre ba med pa dang / mi 'dre ba med pa'i tshul can no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams
cad ni| bdag gi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bdag la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ sems can

gyi tshul can no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / slong ba po dang /

shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bdag gtan med cing sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang /

gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / slong ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'ang gtan med na/ rab 'byor/ 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta dmigs par ga
la 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ rtag ba'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rtag pa ci'ang gtan med na/ 'gro
ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ bde ba'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ bdag gi tshul can dang / sdug
pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / sdug pa gtan med na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la
yod| rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ mi rtag pa'i tshul can yin no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de
las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mi rtag pa gtan med cing sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag med pa'am/ mi sdug pa gtan med na/ de'i 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab
'byor| chos thams cad ni/ 'dod chags kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'dod chags kyi dngos po gtan med na/ 'dod chags lta ga la
yod| rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ zhe sdang gi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ zhe sdang gi dngos po gtan med na/ zhe sdang lta ga la yod/
rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ gti mug gi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gti mug gi dngos po gtan med na/ gti mug lta ga la yod/ rab
'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ lta bar gyur pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ lta bar gyur pa'i dngos po gtan med na/ lta bar gyur pa lta ga la yod/
rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin nyid kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//
rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul can no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshul can dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul can dang / bsam gyis mi khyab
pa'i dbyings kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/
chos thams cad ni/ mi g.yo ba'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos 'ga' la'ang g.yo ba med pas/ 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /
rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ gzugs kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs gtan med na/ de la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod//
rab 'byor/ de bzhin du chos thams cad ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa gtan mi dmigs na/ de'i 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can te/ de
dag ni| tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa gtan med na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du chos thams cad ni/ tshul khrims kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las
mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtan med na/ de'i 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi tshul can

yin no/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
pa nyid gtan med na/ de'i 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe

na| dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gtan med na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du chos thams cad ni/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang /

stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi tshul can te/ de dag
ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i tshul
can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni/
tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ni/ 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//
rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las dag mos par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyod spyod pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams
kyis yongs su smin par byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su

zin pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi
bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par
'gyur ba de dag gi rtags rnams dang / rnam pa rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams dang / rang bzhin du 'gyur ba gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni/ 'dod chags
bsal bas/ dben pa'i rang bzhin can dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de dag ni/ 'dod chags kyi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang
bzhin can du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de dag ni/ 'dod
chags kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin can du
'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtogs par gyur pa de dag ji lta bu'i tshul can
du 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtogs pa de dag ni/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can de dag ni/ sems
can thams cad kyi rten lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can yin pas/ sems can thams cad kyi rten yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis 'di ltar bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /zhes go cha de dag
'tshal la/ de la sems can dang / sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs pa ni/ dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab
'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /zhes go cha de bgos pa de dag ni/ dka' ba byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan med pa'i phyir te/ de bas
na| go cha de ni/ gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ go cha de ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na| rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bas na/ go cha de ni/ rnam par shes pa dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ go cha de

ni| bdag gi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin zhing / sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po

dang / slong ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ go cha de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gtan med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ kye ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag gis 'di ltar bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs
su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /zhes go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ chos thams cad dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /zhes go cha 'tshal ba de ni/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
sa'i gnas gnyis su mi mchi bar 'tshal bar bgyi ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ gnas ma mchis shing go skabs ma lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
gang sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /zhes de ltar go cha 'tshal ba de nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba de ni/ gnas ma mchis lags so/ /de
ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ sa mtshams bkum ste sems can rnams kyi ched du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags
pa'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na
'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis las gnas gcig tu mi 'gro bar shes par bya'o/ /zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyogs gcig gi sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyogs gcig gi sems can rnams kyi phyir go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad
yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir go cha bgos pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa ni/ zab lags te/ de ni/ sus kyang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ gang du'ang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ ji ltar yang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni/ gang bsgom pa dang / gang la bsgom pa dang / gang gis sgom pa'i chos 'ga' yongs su grub pa'ang mi dmigs te/
bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ nam mkha' bsgom pa lags so/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ chos thams
cad ma mchis pa bsgom pa lags so/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ ma mchis pa bsgom pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ bsgom pa rnam par 'jig
pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin/ rab
'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ bdag bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ shes
pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi bsgom pa
rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par
'jig pa lags so/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
dang / lam bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ stobs bcu bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa
rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ gzugs
bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ ci/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par zhen par ma gyur tam zhes
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya ste/ ci/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen par ma gyur tam/ ci/ phyir mi
ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni/ gzhan gyis smras pa dang / gzhan gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lta'am/
ci| phyir mi ldog ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de/ gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro'am/ ci/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de/ 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi 'phrog gam/ zhe sdang dang / gti
mug dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi 'phrog gam/ ci/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa
de| sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ ci/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa
de| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na/ mi skrag gam/ mi dngang ngam/ dngang bar mi 'gyur ram/ zhum par mi 'gyur ram/ 'gong bar mi 'gyur ram/ de'i yid phyir
phyogs par mi 'gyur ram/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi 'brel lam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa la mngon par dga'am/ thos
nas kyang 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed dam/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed dam zhes brtag
par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sngon gyi dus na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dri ba byas pa
dang / bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ phyir mi ldog
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na/ mi skrag /mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur/
'gong bar mi 'gyur te/ yid phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed
pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na/ mi skrag/ mi
dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur/ 'gong bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i yid phyir phyogs par yang mi 'gyur ba lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnam par dpyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems
kyi rgyud rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyad par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems kyi rgyud rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnam par dpyad par
bgyi| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rgyud stong pa nyid la gzhol ba dang / stong pa nyid la 'bab pa
dang / stong pa nyid la bab pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ sems kyi rgyud mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba dang / smon pa med
pa la gzhol ba dang / sems kyi rgyud nam mkha' la gzhol ba dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rab 'byor/ sems kyi rgyud skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med
pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba dang / sems kyi rgyud de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ sems kyi rgyud rmi lam
lta bu la gzhol ba dang / sprul pa lta bu la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyod pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud stong pa nyid la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par dpyod pa yin no/ /
zhes bgyi ba nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud rmi lam lta bu'i bar la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
rnam par dpyod pa yin no/ /zhes bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la'ang rnam par dpyod pa bgyid pa lags
sam| tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la'ang rnam par dpyod par bgyid lags sam/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi bar la'ang rnam par dpyod pa bgyid lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gzugs
la rnam par dpyod par mi byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par dpyod par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rnam par dpyod par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ sus kyang ma byas/ 'gyur bar ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du'ang ma song / gang na'ang mi 'dug la/ yul na'ang mi gnas/ phyogs na'ang
mi gnas te/ de la ni/ grangs dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba mi dmigs la/ gang la grangs dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba mi dmigs pa de ni/ sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par
byang chub par mi nus te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar gyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na| gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa dang / tshor ba nyid dang / 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed nyid dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
gang yin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig go /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig go /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yin no/ /de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid yin no/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ 'dod chags 'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri
brgyad stong pa/ bam po sum cu rtsa drug pa/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma blangs shing / lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da
dang / pad+ma dkar po dag blangs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor to/ /gtor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du /gzugs
nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gcig ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid
gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gcig ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /zhes ston pa
'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ zab cing mthong bar dka' la rtogs par dka' ste/ brtag mi nus
shing rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags la/ zhi ba zhib mor brtag pa'i mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa lags te/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lags so/ /de skad
ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin no/ /
de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /de bzhin du
sbyar te| sangs rgyas kyi bar nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas so/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gcig ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te
sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gcig ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
su dbyer med do/ /don gyi dbang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'phrin las chung ngu la thugs gzhol te/ chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye
ma 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni/ zab cing mthong bar dka' la rtogs par dka' ste/ brtag mi nus shing rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin la/ zhi ba zhib
mor brtag pa'i mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin te/ de ni/ sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas shing / gang du'ang
mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis kun tu rgyu ba med pa de ni/ chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag/ nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /
lha'i bu dag/ de bzhin nyid zab pa dang / chos kyi dbyings zab pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i
bu dag /mtha' yas mu med pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba dang / 'gag pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par
byang ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / bdag zab pa nyid dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du zab pa'i
phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir
chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag
pa zab pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//
stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du zab pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir lha'i bu dag/ kye ma chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi
mthun pa'i chos 'di bstan lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni/ gzugs gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du'ang ma lags/
tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du'ang ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du'ang ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i
slad du'ang ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos bstan pa zab mo 'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i
slad du'ang ma lags/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung
ba'i slad du/ bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du'ang ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten ni/ bdag gi gzugs so/ /bdag ni/ gzugs so/ /bdag gi tshor ba'o/ /'du
shes so| |'du byed rnams so/ /rnam par shes pa'o/ /bdag ni/ rnam par shes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
bu'o/ /bdag ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag gi lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag
gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /bdag ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /bdag gi rang byang chub bo/ /bdag ni/
rang byang chub bo/ /bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bdag ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /zhes bgyi bar 'dzin pa la spyod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag/ chos de ni/ gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'ang ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'ang ma yin
no| |tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'ang ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'ang ma yin no/ /lha'i bu dag /gang
dag gzugs gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag la ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'i skal ba med
de| bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du sgom par mi nus so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
sgom par mi nus so/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni/ chos thams cad dang mthun pa lags te/ chos 'di ni/ chos gang dag dang mthun pa lags she na/
chos 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang mthun pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang
mthun pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun pa lags so/ /chos 'di ni/ gang la'ang thogs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ ci la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags she na/ gzugs la thogs pa ma
mchis pa lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /chos 'di ni/ nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa
nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis
pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan
nyid lags so/ /chos 'di ni/ gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba
ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i slad du skye
ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /chos 'di ni/ gzugs kyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
pa'i gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du gzhi ma mchis pa lags
so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/
bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ci dang ci ston pa de thams cad stong pa nyid kho na las brtsams te ston pa'i slad du'o/ /
de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu dag /gang 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnas
brtan rab 'byor 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa lags so/ /zhes smras pa ni/ ji ltar rjes su skyes pas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa
yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ma 'ongs ma song ba ste/ de bzhin du rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song ba ste/ de ltar na/ gnas
brtan rab 'byor ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyi
de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
nyid ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam
par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid
gang la'ang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang gang la'ang thogs pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams
cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin nyid ni/ ma byas pa ste/ de bzhin nyid de ni/ gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa'ang
med de/ gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid de gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa'ang med cing / nam yang de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa ma yin pa de'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med
cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de ltar na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ thams
cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/ de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do/ /ji ltar de bzhin
gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad pa/ dbyer med pa/ dmigs su med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa/ dbyer med pa/ dmigs su med pa'o/ /
de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa/ dbyer med pa/ dmigs su med pa ste/ de ltar na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin
no| |de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod pa ma yin te/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod pa ma yin pa gang
yin pa de ni/ nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin zhing / de ni/ rtag tu de bzhin nyid do/ /gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang de lta bu ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan ma yin pas/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes kyang gang du'ang skyes pa med do/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin pa de bzhin du
chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa
ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de ltar na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bu dag /'di la 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis
de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin
nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin
nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis da
ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid de/ de ltar na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med de/
gnyis su dbyer med do/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba
dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshor ba dang / 'du
shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de ltar na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i
de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin du shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid do/ /de ltar na/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de
bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / tshul khrims dang /
bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med

do| |nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med

do| |dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de
bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /de ltar na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
bzhin nyid de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med do/ /lha'i bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan brnyes so/ /de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg
go |chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /
shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'o/ /nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'o/ /byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'o/ /lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'o/ /mtha' mtho na dbus dma'o//
dbus mtho na mtha' dma'o/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag gis gtor
mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs
pa'i rjes su skyes pa ni/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /zhes tshig tu brjod do/ /de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces
smras so/ /lha'i bu dag /'di ltar/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes/ gzugs las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ gzugs
gyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/
rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rjes
su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi
rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus ma byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus ma byas kyi
de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ gang gis rjes su skyes pa dang / gang rjes su skye ba'i
chos de med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de
bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam
gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni/ zab pa ste/ de la ni/ gzugs mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs
par lta ga la 'gyur/ de la ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa
nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin nyid ni/ zab pa ste/ de la gzugs mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/
gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ rnam
par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur te/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong nyis brgya len pa
med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong ma lnga brgya ni/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag
go /byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yongs su nyams pa'i chos can drug cu ni/ len pa med par zag pa rnams las
sems rnam par grol lo/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas lnga brgya la bsnyen bkur byas te thams cad du sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod
pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bskyed/ shes rab bsgoms kyang de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing / thabs la mkhas pas yongs
su ma zin pas/ 'di ltar spyad de/ 'di ni/ sbyin pa'o/ /'di la sbyin par bya'o/ /bdag gis tshul khrims 'di bsrung ngo / /bzod pa 'di bsgom mo/ /brtson 'grus 'di brtsam mo/ /bsam
gtan 'di la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o/ /shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o/ /snyam du de ltar spyod pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma
zin pas/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab bsgom zhing de dag 'du shes sna tshogs la spyod pas tha dad pa med pa ma
dmigs pa'i phyir de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la ma zhugs so/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la ma zhugs pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /dgra bcom
pa nyid kyi bar du thob bo/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma med pa'am/ smon pa med pa yod mod kyi/ de dag shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing / thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byas nas nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la bsgoms su 'dra'ang thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba ngag /yang
dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyis nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa
dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid bsgoms su bas kyang thabs la mkhas pa la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
lags| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
med pa'i chos rnams bsgom zhing / thabs la mkhas pa la ma brten pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba rnams ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bsgom
zhing / thabs la mkhas pa la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ri'i
bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dab chags bya zhig lus dpag tshad brgya'am/ lus dpag tshad nyis brgya'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya'am/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya'am/ dpag tshad lnga
brgya pa zhig yod la/ de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas dzam+bu'i gling du 'ong bar sems la/ bya de'ang 'dab ma med pa zhig yin zhing / de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas bdag
nyid mchongs te dzam+bu'i gling du 'gro bar bya bar sems la/ gal te bya de sa la ma lhung bar 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas par bya'o/ /snyam
du sems na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ bya de phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du gnas par nus snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ rngo mi
thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te de bar de nas 'di snyam du/ ma la bdag ma smas ma snad bar dzam+bu'i gling du gnas par bya'o/ /snyam du bsam na/ shA
ri'i bu| 'di ji snyam du sems/ bya de ma smas ma snad par dzam+bu'i gling du gnas par 'gyur snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ rngo mi thogs lags te/ bcom
ldan 'das/ bya de ni/ smas pa'am snad par yang 'gyur la dzam+bu'i gling du ma mchis par 'gum pa'am/ 'gum la thug par sdug bsngal bar yang 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar de ni/ lus che la 'dab ma ma mchis shing / mthon po zhig nas mchongs pas/ de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi 'tshal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa| shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgom/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam
gtan la snyoms par 'jug cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de'i 'jug pa'ang che/ sems bskyed pa'ang che/
phan gdags par bsam pa'ang tshad med du zin kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin na/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
lhung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bar sbyin pa byin/
tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bskyed kyang byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral
bar 'gyur te/ des na/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la sems shing / kun tu 'dzin la
mtshan mar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims mi shes/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i bar du mi shes na/ de mi shes shing khong du ma chud pas/
stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra thos na/ zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzin te/ mtshan mar bzung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i
bu| 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa
ni| de ltar 'gyur te/ de nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgrub/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa ni/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge
'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa gang yin pa de thams cad mtshan mar mi 'dzin te/ de stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la
mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin na/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ nyan thos kyi
sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye
bar bzung ste sbyin pa byin yang mtshan mar ma bzung / tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgrubs/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs/
shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab
dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms kyang
mtshan mar ma bzung ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar/ mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom
pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab sgom pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod kyang mtshan mar ma bzung ba 'di ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i
don 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma
bral ba de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ the tshom ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i
gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos gang yang ma dmigs pa'i slad du'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag gi bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ the tshom mchis par rig par bgyi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba bdag gis sbyin pa ci dang ci stsal ba de thams cad mtshan mar bzung nas stsal ba dang / tshul khrims
ci dang ci bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan gang dang gang la mnyam par bzhag pa de thams cad kyang mtshan mar bzung nas mnyam par
bzhag pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
ni| the tshom mchis par rig par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar lags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs
la mkhas pa la gnas te mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa stsal bar bgyi/ tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi/ bzod pa bsgrub par bgyi/
brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi/ bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi/ shes rab bsgom par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyad par bgyi'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang bgyi 'tshal la/ chos de dag kyang ma mchis shing mi dmigs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub ni/ mngon par 'byung bar dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag /de de bzhin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ mngon par
'byung bar dka' ba yin no/ /lha'i bu dag /ngas kyang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ ngas ni/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am/ gang
gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dag /chos thams cad shin tu rnam par
dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
ni| mngon par 'byung bar dka'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba dang / bdag sems pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid pa
su'ang ma mchis shing / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ci'ang ma mchis pas/ chos thams cad ni/ stong pa lags te/ chos thams cad stong pa la ni/ gang mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya bar bgyid pa dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de ma mchis pa'i slad
du'o| /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar/ chos thams cad ni/ stong pa lags te/ chos gang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba'am/ yongs su 'grib par bgyi ba'i slad du sbyin pa
stsol bar bgyid pa dang / bsam gtan gyi bar la snyoms par 'jug par bgyid pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa'i chos de dag kyang ma mchis shing / gang mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid pa dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams cad kyang stong pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/
'di ltar/ gzugs ni/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing / de bzhin
du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di

skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
pa rab 'byor/ 'di ltar/ nam mkha' ni/ 'di snyam du/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /snyam du mi sems so/ /tshe dang
ldan pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'di snyam du/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
bya'o| |snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/ chos thams cad ni/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams
cad nam mkha' lta bur mos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams
cad nam mkha' lta bur mos par mi byed kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla ste/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba ma
yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ rnam grangs
des na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ste/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla ba ma yin par

mngon no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin nyid kyi bar dag bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de/ gzugs las gud na yod snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las gud na yod snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/
ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi par las gud na yod snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe
dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
las ldog snyam mam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las
gud na yod snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ de bzhin du gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin
nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ chos
nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam mam/ chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de de bzhin nyid las gud na yod snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de/ bsam gyis mi
khyab pa'i dbyings kyi bar las gud na yod snyam mam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ de ltar bden pa'i tshul bzhin du chos de dag mi dmigs na/ gang bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos de gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras
so| |gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa des bstan pa ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog
pa gang yang med de/ de'i phyir gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gsum po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gsum po de dag
rnam par bzhag par yang mi 'gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bstan pa ltar na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gcig pur 'gyur
ro| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gnas brtan rab 'byor byang chub gcig kyang 'dod dam zhes

gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di la dri dgos so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod dam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ci/ de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems
dpa' gsum 'dod dam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dod
dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ci/ de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' gsum du dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin nyid rnam pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum du dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /
smras pa/ de ltar bden pa'i tshul bzhin du chos de dag mi dmigs na/ ci las tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'o/ /byang chub
sems dpa' 'di ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'o/ /zhes bya bar sems par gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bye brag med par rab tu phye ba la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing /
yid 'gyod pa med pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/
'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab 'byor khyod spobs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin
nyid kyis bye brag med par rab tu phye ba la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing / yid 'gyod pa med la/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub gang la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems
la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ mi mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmigs
par bya ste/ mi mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can
thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste/ brlang pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad
la g.yo med par dmigs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ gnod pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la phan
pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste/ gnod pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ zhe 'gras pa'i
